Action.author: holocron
Action.body: I tried installing fabric-sdk-node the old way - by cloning the repo and placing PTE in the test directory. This worked for instantiation so it appears to be a problem with how PTE is installing fabric-client and fabric-ca-client in the 1.1 branch.

Action.author: holocron
Action.body: The release-1.1 branch shouldn't be installing fabric-client@1.2, but it does do this today.

Action.author: dongming
Action.body: please git pull fabric-test again. The package.json show 1.1.0, https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-test/blob/release-1.1/tools/PTE/package.json

Action.author: holocron
Action.body: Moving to Done, this is user error..
